title: intrusion detectionprevention system IDSIDPS
extract: An intrusion detection system (IDS) is a device or software application that monitors a network or systems for malicious activity or policy violations. ... A system that monitors important operating system files is an example of an HIDS, while a system that analyzes incoming network traffic is an example of an NIDS.
extract_html: An intrusion detection system (IDS) is a device or software application that monitors a network or systems for malicious activity or policy violations. ... A system that monitors important operating system files is an example of an HIDS, while a system that analyzes incoming network traffic is an example of an NIDS.
